label: [{"start":2,"end":8,"text":"鸡贫血因子病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":10,"end":15,"text":"鸡贫血病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":50,"end":57,"text":"免疫抑制性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":60,"end":66,"text":"出血性综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":67,"end":75,"text":"贫血性皮炎综合征","labels":["disease"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":20,"end":27,"text":"再生障碍性贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":36,"text":"全身淋巴组织萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":37,"end":44,"text":"皮下和肌肉出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":34,"text":"淋巴组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 又名鸡贫血因子病，由鸡贫血病毒引起的雏鸡再生障碍性贫血、全身淋巴组织萎缩、皮下和肌肉出血为特征的一种免疫抑制性疾病。又称出血性综合征或贫血性皮炎综合征。

label: [{"start":0,"end":7,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":40,"end":48,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病毒","labels":["disease"]},{"start":115,"end":122,"text":"免疫抑制性疾病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":88,"end":90,"text":"雏鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":92,"end":99,"text":"再生障碍性贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":100,"end":109,"text":"全身性淋巴组织萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":107,"end":109,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":136,"end":144,"text":"细菌和真菌性感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":103,"end":107,"text":"淋巴组织","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 鸡传染性贫血病(Chicken Infectious Anemia，CIA)是由鸡传染性贫血病毒(Chicken infectious anemia virus,CIAV)引起雏鸡的以再生障碍性贫血和全身性淋巴组织萎缩为特征的一种免疫抑制性疾病，经常合并、继发和加重病毒、细菌和真菌性感染，危害很大。

label: [{"start":53,"end":61,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 1979年首次在日本发现本病，之后相继在德国、瑞典、英国、美国、澳大利亚、荷兰、丹麦、波兰、巴西等国分离到鸡传染性贫血病毒。

label: [{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"发病鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":66,"end":68,"text":"鸡群","labels":["type"]},{"start":55,"end":63,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病毒","labels":["disease"]}]
text: 在我国，李孝欣，崔现兰于1992年从发病鸡群中分离到病毒，从而确证该病在我国的存在。根据近几年的流行病学调查，鸡传染性贫血病毒在我国鸡群中的感染率约在40%～70%。

label: [{"start":19,"end":26,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":36,"end":43,"text":"鸡传染性贫血病","labels":["disease"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"肉鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 国内外的病原分离和血清学调查结果表明，鸡传染性贫血病可能呈世界性分布，由鸡传染性贫血病诱发的疾病已成为一个严重的经济问题，特别是对肉鸡的生产。

label: [{"start":9,"end":11,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 本病的特征性症状是贫血。一般在感染后10天发病，14～16天达到高峰。

label: [{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"精神沉郁","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"虚弱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":13,"end":17,"text":"行动迟缓","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":22,"text":"羽毛松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"松乱","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":28,"end":39,"text":"面部皮肤和可视粘膜苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":37,"end":39,"text":"苍白","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":40,"end":44,"text":"生长不良","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":45,"end":49,"text":"体重下降","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":57,"end":59,"text":"拉稀","labels":["symptom"]},{"start":18,"end":20,"text":"羽毛","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":24,"text":"喙","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"肉髯","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":32,"text":"面部皮肤","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":33,"end":37,"text":"可视粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病鸡表现为精神沉郁，虚弱，行动迟缓，羽毛松乱，喙、肉髯、面部皮肤和可视粘膜苍白，生长不良，体重下降；临死前还可见到拉稀。

label: [{"start":0,"end":6,"text":"血液稀薄如水","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":7,"end":10,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":47,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":60,"end":63,"text":"自细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":73,"end":76,"text":"血小板","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":40,"end":42,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"稀薄","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 血液稀薄如水，红细胞压积值降到20%以下(正常值在30%以上，降到27%以下便为贫血)，红细胞数低于200万个/mm3，自细胞数低于5000个脚，血小板值低于27%。

label: [{"start":12,"end":20,"text":"红细胞的异常变化","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":12,"end":15,"text":"红细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 在病的严重时期，还可见到红细胞的异常变化。

label: [{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"发病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":53,"end":59,"text":"鸡传染性贫血","labels":["disease"]},{"start":111,"end":112,"text":"鸡","labels":["type"]}]
text: 发病鸡的死亡率不一致，受到病毒、细菌、宿主和环境等许多因素的影响，实验感染的死亡率不超过30%，无并发症的鸡传染性贫血，特别是由水平感染引起的，不会引起高死亡率。如有继发感染，可加重病情；死亡增多。感染后20～28天存活的鸡可逐渐恢复正常。

label: [{"start":5,"end":9,"text":"病鸡贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":7,"end":9,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":10,"end":12,"text":"消瘦","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":13,"end":22,"text":"肌肉与内脏器官苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":20,"end":22,"text":"苍白","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":26,"end":33,"text":"肝脏和肾脏肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":31,"end":33,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":36,"text":"褪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":38,"end":41,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":42,"end":46,"text":"血液稀薄","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":53,"text":"凝血时间延长","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":5,"end":7,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":13,"end":15,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":16,"end":20,"text":"内脏器官","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":28,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":29,"end":31,"text":"肾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":42,"end":44,"text":"血液","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"稀薄","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 病理变化：病鸡贫血，消瘦，肌肉与内脏器官苍白、贫血；肝脏和肾脏肿大，褪色，或淡黄色：血液稀薄，凝血时间延长。

label: [{"start":0,"end":4,"text":"骨髓萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":2,"end":4,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":2,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":6,"end":8,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":97,"end":99,"text":"病鸡","labels":["type"]},{"start":19,"end":29,"text":"大腿骨的骨髓呈脂肪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":30,"end":33,"text":"淡黄色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":34,"end":37,"text":"粉红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":44,"end":53,"text":"骨髓的颜色呈暗红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":50,"end":53,"text":"暗红色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":67,"end":71,"text":"胸腺萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":69,"end":71,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":80,"end":84,"text":"深红褐色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":110,"end":114,"text":"胸腺萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":115,"end":119,"text":"骨髓病变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":112,"end":114,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":117,"end":119,"text":"病变","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":22,"text":"大腿骨","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":23,"end":25,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":46,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":67,"end":69,"text":"胸腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":110,"end":112,"text":"胸腺","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":115,"end":117,"text":"骨髓","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":26,"end":29,"text":"脂肪色","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":90,"end":94,"text":"完全退化","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 骨髓萎缩是在病鸡所见到的最特征性病变，大腿骨的骨髓呈脂肪色、淡黄色或粉红色。在有些病例，骨髓的颜色呈暗红色，组织学检查可见明显的病变。胸腺萎缩是最常见的病变，呈深红褐色，可能导致其完全退化，随着病鸡的生长，抵抗力的提高，胸腺萎缩比骨髓病变更容易观察到。

label: [{"start":0,"end":5,"text":"法氏囊萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":3,"end":5,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":14,"end":21,"text":"法氏囊体积缩小","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":40,"text":"法氏囊的外壁呈半透明状态","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":35,"end":40,"text":"半透明状态","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":47,"end":52,"text":"内部的皱襞","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":72,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":58,"end":64,"text":"腺胃粘膜出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":62,"end":64,"text":"出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":65,"end":72,"text":"皮下与肌肉出血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":77,"end":81,"text":"细菌感染","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":85,"end":90,"text":"坏疽性皮炎","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":91,"end":99,"text":"肝脏肿大呈斑驳状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":93,"end":95,"text":"肿大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":96,"end":99,"text":"斑驳状","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":0,"end":3,"text":"法氏囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":14,"end":17,"text":"法氏囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"法氏囊的外壁","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":58,"end":62,"text":"腺胃粘膜","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":65,"end":67,"text":"皮下","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":68,"end":70,"text":"肌肉","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":91,"end":93,"text":"肝脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":17,"end":21,"text":"体积缩小","labels":["pathology"]}]
text: 法氏囊萎缩不很明显，有的病例法氏囊体积缩小，在许多病例的法氏囊的外壁呈半透明状态，以至于可见到内部的皱襞。有时可见到腺胃粘膜出血和皮下与肌肉出血。若有继发细菌感染，可见到坏疽性皮炎，肝脏肿大呈斑驳状以及其他组织的病变。

label: [{"start":11,"end":18,"text":"再生障碍性贫血","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":19,"end":27,"text":"全身淋巴组织萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":25,"end":27,"text":"萎缩","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":28,"end":38,"text":"骨髓造血细胞严重减少","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":39,"end":51,"text":"几乎完全被脂肪组织所代替","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":70,"end":78,"text":"淋巴细胞严重缺失","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":79,"end":85,"text":"网状细胞增大","labels":["pathology"]},{"start":21,"end":25,"text":"淋巴组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":28,"end":34,"text":"骨髓造血细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":44,"end":48,"text":"脂肪组织","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":52,"end":55,"text":"法氏囊","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":56,"end":58,"text":"脾脏","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":59,"end":64,"text":"盲肠扁桃体","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":70,"end":74,"text":"淋巴细胞","labels":["bodypart"]},{"start":79,"end":83,"text":"网状细胞","labels":["bodypart"]}]
text: 病理组织学特征性变化是再生障碍性贫血和全身淋巴组织萎缩。骨髓造血细胞严重减少，几乎完全被脂肪组织所代替。法氏囊、脾脏、盲肠扁桃体及其他器官的淋巴细胞严重缺失，网状细胞增大。
